cybertruck1956697915608731754.content: Made to roll up my sleeves  – Durable stainless steel that can take a beating – 11,000lbs towing capacity – 120V/240V outlets in the bed – Ability to use as a backup generator via Powershare – Adjustable, self-leveling air suspension – 4-wheel steering + steering by wire for
cybertruck1956697915608731754.author: cybertruck

cybertruck1951198323760660784.content: Just letting you know that Cybertruck has the lowest probability of injury & lowest rollover risk of any pickup tested by NHTSA  And I drive myself to help avoid accidents in the first place  Best crash = no crash, but if the worst happens, I’ve got your back
cybertruck1951198323760660784.author: cybertruck

cybertruck1948824388922753092.content: Imagine you could road trip for free  Well … inventory Cybertrucks come with 1 year of free Supercharging  Go get back out in the world. Get back out on the road. Do the bucket list trips.  I’ll even drive for you
cybertruck1948824388922753092.author: cybertruck

cybertruck1946198849065812148.content: Cybertruck comes standard with a hospital-grade HEPA filter that will protect you and your family from >99.97% of dust, pollen, mold, bacteria & any airborne particle – no matter if you’re off roading or in an environment with bad air quality
cybertruck1946198849065812148.author: cybertruck
